alert.note: Alert for Big Lost Highlands, Copper Basin; Frank Church Wilderness; Lost River Range (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 20 at 11:54AM MST until December 21 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 5 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Light snow and blowing and drifting snow from high wind. Total snow accumulations of up to three inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Borah Peak, Clayton and Copper Basin. Frank Church Wilderness and Big Lost Highlands. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 5 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. The cold wind chills as low as 30 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Big Lost Highlands, Copper Basin; Frank Church Wilderness; Lost River Range
